Package ch.cpnv.vox.meteor_destroy.states

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameOverState
    The GameOverState is the state displayed when we loose all our life in the game.
    GameState
    The Game State is the principal state, we play the game on this one.
    GameStateManager
    This class will manage all our state system.
    MenuState
    this is the first State of the game, the menu with a play button
    State
    This is the mother class of all our State.
